description: {"blocks":[{"key":"hrlt","text":"This protocol describes the methods used to trace and enable morphometric quantification of vagal afferent neurites in mucosal layers of the rat GI system.  A mixture of dextran conjugates was injected into the nodose ganglia of young adult Sprague-Dawley rats and after a survival period of 14 days for optimal tracer transport, stomachs and intestines were removed and selected pieces embedded in gelatin, sectioned and processed. ABC-DAB was used to create a permanent gold-brown stain of all labeled afferent neurites. Some samples were also counterstained for ghrelin and gastrin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_equipments.name: Leica VT1200 S Fully automated vibrating blade microtome
Leica TP1020 Semi-enclosed Benchtop Tissue Processor

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eljk5","text":"Two- to four-month-old male","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3gcs2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9sd71","text":"rats in the weight range of 180g to 360g at the time of tracer injection were housed individually in wire hanging cages or in vented rack plastic cages in an Association for Assessment and Accreditation of Laboratory Animal Care-approved temperature (22–24 °C) and humidity (40–60%)-controlled colony room. The room was maintained on a 12-hour light–dark schedule. Pelleted chow","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5r0i7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"chp47","text":"and filtered tap water were provided ad libitum, except for the night before tracer injection, when food but not water was removed. All husbandry practices conformed to the NIH Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals (8th edition) and were reviewed and approved by the Purdue University Animal Care and Use Committee. All efforts were made to minimize any suffering as well as the number of animals used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":177,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":193034,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Sprague-Dawley","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"RGD_737903","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"BCE603806C1311E9897141474B552D70","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":476,"name":"Envigo","link":"https://www.envigo.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":193064,"mol_weight":0,"name":"2018 Teklad global 18% protein rodent diet","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"3E9302E06DDE11E9921149D9B4314996","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":476,"name":"Envigo","link":"https://www.envigo.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en48d","text":"For dextran injections, each anesthetized animal was placed in a supine position, and a midline incision of the skin of the ventral neck was made. Both nodose ganglia were then exposed by blunt dissection of the overlying muscles. Each animal received bilateral injections (1 μl per ganglion) of lysine-fixable dextran biotin solution consisting of a 1:1 mixture of 3K and 10K MW dextrans in ultrapure DI water or PBS - final {"blocks":[{"key":"48njb","text":"After a survival period of 14 days for optimal tracer transport, each rat was given a lethal dose (180 mg/kg−1, i.p.) of sodium pentobarbital or a combination of","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":108,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"61idu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d6sbj","text":"and ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6j78p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"c09l","text":"(275 mg/kg ketamine and 27.5 mg/kg xylazine). The animals had food available ad libitum until they were anesthetized, to facilitate the stomach being full and relaxed in accommodation. When each animal was completely unresponsive to nociceptive pinching and prodding, the GI tract was exposed with a midline abdominal incision.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b7h0p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ce1so","text":"(0.5ml, 1000 units/ml) was then injected into the heart and the animal was transcardially perfused through the vasculature, first with physiological saline and then with 4% paraformaldehyde in 0.1 mol liter−1 phosphate-buffered saline (PBS; pH 7.4). {"blocks":[{"key":"7668j","text":"Place tissue into tissue baskets and into the tissue processor in an initial container of 4% PF, and run a program overnight with the following parameters.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77fph","text":"Ultrapure Water @ 25°C - 2hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eer8b","text":"Ultrapure Water @ 25°C - 4hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dr66","text":"5% Gelatin @ 45°C - 2hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmlp4","text":"10% Gelatin @ 45°C - 2hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8aoho","text":"15% Gelatin @ 45°C - 2hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51q7k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7u8v9","text":"Time the program so that it ends at an appropriate time the following morning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":1111,"brand":"Leica Biosystems","can_edit":0,"guid":"A622EEE0446E11EABD8D856E423670F5","link":"https://www.leicabiosystems.com/histology-equipment/tissue-processors/products/leica-tp1020/","name":"Leica TP1020 Semi-enclosed Benchtop Tissue Processor","sku":"TP1020","specifications":null,"type":null,"vendor":{"id":416,"name":"Leica Biosystems","link":"https://www.leicabiosystems.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2l7jv","text":"Rinse for 3x10min in PBS, followed by a 3% hydrogen peroxide – methanol block (1:4) for 30 min to quench endogenous peroxidase activity.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6sf4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s81p","text":"Then rinse again for 3x10min in PBS, and then soak for 3–5 days in PBS containing 0.5% Triton X-100 and 0.08% Na azide at 4°C to facilitate penetration of reagents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqm4s","text":"Transfer each section to a gelatin coated glass slide, 3-4 sections per slide, maintaining a consistent orientation and section order and label slide with pencil, and allow the slides to dry overnight. Then soak in 4% PF for 1 hour, rinse 3 times with dH2O, and allow the slides to dry overnight.
